name: Realms (itch) (EverythingsFine)
description:
Welcome to Realms, a student capstone project in the form of a tabletop inspired first-person shooter. 

The player assumes the role of Fortuna, a young woman training to become the new Guardian of the Die of Chaos, an archaically powerful artifact. You use it to stop a dimension-hopping, universe destroying parasite.

Use your abilities and alternate gun fire spells to help Fortuna explore the world and destroy any and all threats along the way.

HOW TO PLAY:

* Movement – WASD   
* Camera Movement – Mouse   
* Jump / Skip Cutscene – Spacebar 
* Dash – Shift
* Shoot – Left Click   
* Perform Actions/Checks – Right Click 
* Perception: A radial wave to reveal hidden objects – Key 1
* Wave Blast: A powerful blast for knockback and destroying obstacles – Key 2 
* Use Spells, or Alternate Fire – Key 3   
* Switch Spell – Key 4  
* Inventory Wheel - Tab Key 
* Pause - ESC

Any and all questions can be answered in the provided README File.
